localReferenceFrames.label: Platform Frame
localReferenceFrames.description: The platform frame is defined as the aircraft principal axes
localReferenceFrames.origin: Center of gravity of the aircraft

axes.name: x
axes.description: Longitudinal or roll axis, parallel to the fuselage reference line, directed forward

axes.name: y
axes.description: Transverse or pitch axis, parallel to the line drawn from wingtip to wingtip, directed to the right of the aircraft when looking forward

axes.name: z
axes.description: Vertical or yaw axis, perpendicular to the wings and to the fuselage reference line, directed toward the bottom of the aircraft
